entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 16 March 2023
